description: Registry of executable agent protocols for development tasks

AGT-001.title: Code Audit Protocol
AGT-001.description: Comprehensive codebase validation: rule compliance, orphan/rogue detection, anti-patterns, redundancy, performance, and security.

AGT-002.title: Rule Audit Protocol
AGT-002.description: Validates rule files for structural integrity, consistency, and coverage.

audit.description: Audit protocols for validating rules and code
